modName: 155 Robes With Magnitude plus Mage craftables
summary: Adds 155 new (disenchantable) robes with Increase magic school magnitude enchantments to the vanilla 155 magic school robes. It also adds 13 craftable robes, 4 craftable mage hoods and 6 craftable staffs.
descriptionHtml:
A total whopping 155 (disenchanteable) robes of increase <magic school> magnitude have been added to shops and random loot. This enchantment causes Destruction, Restoration and Illusion spells to be stronger and Alteration and Conjuration effects to last longer.
you will have 50% chance that a robe contains the Cost less magicka enchantment and 50% that it will contain the increased magnitude enchantment, Giving a bit more variation early game and giving a way to increase your spell strength without having to clog down a potion late game.

How to get these Robes: Go inside an unvisited dungeon and kill some mages or buy those robes from either an unvisited merchant or after restock.

You\'re also able to craft 13 different robes, 4 different mage hoods and 6 different staffs.

How to craft robes: First you\'ll need to get a ragged robe. You can make one from 10 leather straps or steal one from a beggar. After that you\'ll require 1 refined moonstones + Extra moonstones, gems or charcoal. Use this to paint your robe and you\'re done!

How to craft a hood: 3 leather straps + refined moonstone (number is dependant of hoodtype) or charcoal + 3 leather straps for the (in vanilla unplayable) black mage hood.

How to craft a staff: you\'ll need 1 firewood, 1 common soulgem and 1 refined moonstone.

For those who are interested in what robes are added:
25 Mage College Robes.
30 Necromancer Robes.
30 Hooded Necromancer Robes.
30 Warlock Robes.
30 Hooded Warlock Robes.

For manual installation: Just drop it in the data folder.

Should not clash with any mods at all but do contact me if it does for you.


Endorse/Comment if you like this mod.
